name: Manzaka
description:
Manzaka is a fun action rpg focus on melee combat and interesting mechanics! Customize your character with different passive skill tree options and blast enemies through levels.

Completely free to play

You don't have to pay to adventure in Manzaka. All content from level 1 to level cap is completely free.

No loading screens

You'll never waste time on loading screens, each area is procedurally created in front of you.

Easy and intuitive crafting system

By finding 3 items of the same, you can merge and get an improved item.

All weapons have their own skill tree

When upgrading your weapons, you can choose from 3 more passive skills that can be changed at any time.

Combo Mechanics

By using your 3 basic attacks, you can generate combo points that will give you different bonuses depending on the weapon in use and also passives that you chose.
